title: Naomi Watts is pretty in floral-themed dress with lace collar at NY premiere for The Morning Show
text:
Last week she was the center of attention as she was honored at the Australians in Film Awards in Los Angeles.

But on Monday night, Naomi Watts was content to play a supporting role as she attended the star-studded New York premiere for Apple+ TV's The Morning Show.

The actress, who was born in the UK and moved to Australia with her family as a teen, looked lovely in a floral-themed dress as she posed for photos on the red carpet.

Pretty: Naomi Watts arrived at the New York premiere for Apple+ TV's The Morning Show on Monday looking lovely in a floral-themed dress with long sleeves and lace collar

Naomi's dress was white and dotted with motifs of lavender blooms and green leaves.

It had long sleeves with cuffs and a white lace collar.

The 51-year-old added a pair of blush pink heels with ornate straps and a blush clutch purse.

Her chin-length blonde bob was styled with an off-center parting and she was made up with black mascara and glossy dark pink lip color.

Flare for fashion: The 51-year-old actress added a pair of blush pink heels with ornate straps and a blush clutch purse

Natural beauty: Her chin-length blonde bob was styled with an off-center parting and she was made up with black mascara and glossy dark pink lip color

On Wednesday October 23, Naomi was presented with the Orry-Kelly Award in recognition of a career in entertainment that has contributed to the national identity of Australia.

Having made her name in Australian TV and film, she came to prominence in Hollywood with roles in David Lynch's Mulholland Drive in 2001 and the 2002 horror film The Grudge.

Nominated for two Academy Awards, her other big screen credits include 21 Grams, King Kong, Fair Game and The Impossible.

Naomi lives in New York where she co-parents her two sons with ex-partner Liev Schreiber.
description: Naomi's dress was white and dotted with motifs of lavender blooms and green leaves. The 51-year-old added a pair of blush pink heels with ornate straps and a blush clutch purse.
